text: Hey all, I just installed an NPM packaged into my theme and it has a CSS file I need to import. How do I import that CSS file? A standard `import` statement or `include` isn't working.

<@U3T21PDBK>
We have several ways to go:
• a PDF with screenshot of the module and text how to use what
• a dedicated/special template which is not available for new pages but with the same approach  as the PDF. Kinda like a/the QA template but with a documentation of every module since we're working 99% only with custom modules
• every field of each custom module got a (inline-) info text with a short info about this particular field
